attributes.action: Not to spend taxpayers money on bringing Samantha Orobator back to the UK and to let her serve her sentance in Laos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Samantha Orabator is a convicted drug smuggler and has no worthwhile purpose in contributing to the UK other than to flood our streets with drugs at our childrens expense. She should be considered lucky that due to her own devious actions she has not been given the death penalty. But she should stay where she is as a detterent to others like her and UK taxpayers money should not be used to help bring her to the UK to be a further burden on us in the UK prison system.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
